wikipedia_page.main: Philip William Herbert Miles (7 January 1848 – 4 December 1933) was an English army officer and first-class cricketer.

response: *Philip Miles (1848–1933), first-class cricketer (Nottinghamshire), was born in Bingham.
* Sir Philip Miles, 2nd Baronet (1825–1888), English politician
* Philip Miles (Indian Army officer) (1864–1948), British officer of the Indian Army
* Philip Miles (cricketer) (1848–1933), English army officer and cricketer
